CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Compliant Team Meetings
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance policies can be configured to analyze Microsoft Teams meeting transcripts for potential policy matches. Teams meeting transcripts are only generated when meeting organizers opt in to meeting recording. Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA) and business conduct violations, such as inappropriate sharing of sensitive/confidential information, adult content, and using harassing or threatening language. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase and adding additional cloud instances to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.description:
,

Teams meeting transcripts are only generated when meeting organizers opt in to meeting recording. Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA) and business conduct violations, such as inappropriate sharing of sensitive/confidential information, adult content, and using harassing or threatening language. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase and adding additional cloud instances to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Slash Commands
CurrentVersion.description: User will be able to type slash in Teams compose box and select a command, helping them complete their task quickly.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Slash Commands
OldVersion.description: User will be able to type slash in Teams compose box and select a command, helping them complete their task quickly.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
CurrentVersion.description: Search now returns content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders. Note: We have updated the release phase to show the current state.  We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
OldVersion.description: Search now returns content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders. Note: We have updated the release phase to show the current state.  We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multi-instance app customization support for Teams apps
CurrentVersion.description: IT admin has the ability to customize Teams apps to align with the company’s brand and enhance their usefulness for employees. By creating and managing multiple customized app instances, it can improve branding, awareness, and user engagement, overcomes the limitations of a single-instance approach and enables greater adaptability to meet the diverse business needs.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multi-instance app customization support for Teams apps
OldVersion.description: IT admin has the ability to customize Teams apps to align with the company’s brand and enhance their usefulness for employees. By creating and managing multiple customized app instances, it can improve branding, awareness, and user engagement, overcomes the limitations of a single-instance approach and enables greater adaptability to meet the diverse business needs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
CurrentVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
OldVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Last used date inside Tenant Allow Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Tenant allow block list domains & addresses, URL, and file entries will show last used date. This helps admins understand when an entry was last used (either at mailflow or time of click), helping them remove entries which are no longer needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Last used date inside Tenant Allow Block List
OldVersion.description: Tenant allow block list domains & addresses, URL, and file entries will show last used date. This helps admins understand when an entry was last used (either at mailflow or time of click), helping them remove entries which are no longer needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Baseline with Project level variance
CurrentVersion.description: Record a snapshot of the project and view project level variance to know if the project is on track or delayed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Project: Baseline with Project level variance
OldVersion.description: Record a snapshot of the project and view project level variance to know if the project is on track or delayed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and desktop/web meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone reactions
OldVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and desktop/web meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
CurrentVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
OldVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Windows Devices support for presenters in town halls
CurrentVersion.description: Presenters can join and present from a Microsoft Teams Room (MTR) Windows device in a town hall.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Windows Devices support for presenters in town halls
OldVersion.description: Presenters can join and present from a Microsoft Teams Room (MTR) Windows device in a town hall.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Reactions in Town halls (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Participants can use reactions (like, love, applause, laugh, surprised) to express themselves during a town hall and the reactions appear as a continuous stream on the side of the screen.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Reactions in Town halls (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Participants can use reactions (like, love, applause, laugh, surprised) to express themselves during a town hall and the reactions appear as a continuous stream on the side of the screen.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Short meeting URL
CurrentVersion.description: We are making meeting URL shorter and removing unnecessary symbols/info from there to make it more convenient for sharing

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Short meeting URL
OldVersion.description: We are making meeting URL shorter and removing unnecessary symbols/info from there to make it more convenient for sharing

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: New feature for silence removal (pauses) in Clipchamp
CurrentVersion.description: ,We think editing your video could be a quick job but isn't necessarily so sometimes. Silence removal uses AI auto transcription to transcribe your audio. We infer pauses in your speech transcription and any gaps in the speech we detected for more than 3 seconds is considered a pause. We provide you with the option to remove all pauses at once with a single click or to review each pause where you can adjust and consider ones you want to keep.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: New feature for silence removal (pauses) in Clipchamp
OldVersion.description: ,We think editing your video could be a quick job but isn't necessarily so sometimes. Silence removal uses AI auto transcription to transcribe your audio. We infer pauses in your speech transcription and any gaps in the speech we detected for more than 3 seconds is considered a pause. We provide you with the option to remove all pauses at once with a single click or to review each pause where you can adjust and consider ones you want to keep.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Access Copilot directly in new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get from the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com ("Work mode"), and in many other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Windows and web. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Access Copilot directly in new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get from the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com ("Work mode"), and in many other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Windows and web. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Users will now be notified when their admin unblocks a requested app
CurrentVersion.description: Users on teams will be notified when their IT Admin unblocks an app that was previously requested by the user.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Users will now be notified when their admin unblocks a requested app
OldVersion.description: Users on teams will be notified when their IT Admin unblocks an app that was previously requested by the user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
OldVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
OldVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook themes generated by Microsoft Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Make Outlook yours with themes generated by Copilot. You will be able to find these themes in Settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Enable deletion of non-empty folders in SharePoint for Microsoft 365 and OneDrive for Business when under a retention policy
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, end users can delete non-empty document library folders containing many files on a site managed by a retention policy. Additionally, this feature ensures that folders covered under a Retention policy and that have been deleted don’t reappear for users who sync a document library offline using OneDrive for Business.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Enable deletion of non-empty folders in SharePoint for Microsoft 365 and OneDrive for Business when under a retention policy
OldVersion.description: With this feature, end users can delete non-empty document library folders containing many files on a site managed by a retention policy. Additionally, this feature ensures that folders covered under a Retention policy and that have been deleted don’t reappear for users who sync a document library offline using OneDrive for Business.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Edit Learning Paths in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Admin will be able to edit learning paths metadata and content. Latest updates will be shown to learner after the LP is edited.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Glint Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: ,Enable managers and leaders to gather additional information and check in on team progress after an org-wide Glint survey. By leveraging a Pulse survey that recommends questions based on the top strengths and opportunities identified in the org-wide Glint survey, managers and leaders can gather a timely understanding of the team’s progress to-date in addressing key focus areas, make mid-point adjustments if needed, and maintain momentum in their efforts to improve engagement and employee experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Decoupling of Policy tips and Email notifications while configuring rules on Data Loss Prevention for Sharepoint and Onedriv
CurrentVersion.description: As of today, whenever the user wants to enable email notifications the policy tips also need to be enabled and vice versa, but with this decoupling the admin can configure the following: 1) None of policy tips or email notification 2) Only policy tips 3) Only Email Notifications 4) Both Email Notifications and Policy tips

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Protect your most sensitive content with double key encryption
CurrentVersion.description:
Double Key Encryption (DKE) provides organizations with a second encryption key for your most sensitive content.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/double-key-encryption

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Protect your most sensitive content with double key encryption
OldVersion.description:
Double Key Encryption (DKE) provides organizations with a second encryption key for your most sensitive content.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/double-key-encryption
